content: st move you should have 47 53 59 67 73 81 87 93 105 111 yellow marker in first st of the round a half_double_crochet and pink sts incl marked corner points on each front and marker in last st of the round a slip_stitch skip the joining back panel and 27 29 33 33 35 37 47 57 69 71 slip_stitch from prev round and the tch and join via slip_stitch in sts excl marked corner points on each sleeve top of first half_double_crochet of the round turn 156 172 192 208 panel for a total of 148 164 184 200 216 236 268 224 244 276 308 356 372 st 300 348 364 sts go to slow increase section dewdrop sweater 2024 pattern and design by crochethighway all rights reserved 10 repeat rnds 1-3 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 7 7 more times and back panel marked corners included and 47 then repeat round 1 once for a total of 31 31 31 31 31 31 49 53 53 55 57 67 77 85 87 sts for each sleeve 31 31 25 25 rnds in the slow increase section and panel marked corners excluded 37 39 41 43 45 47 51 55 55 57 rnds in the yoke turn your work so that the ws is facing you and join last round made is on the rs and has 228 244 264 new yarn via slip_stitch in corner slip_stitch marked with 280 296 316 348 380 412 428 sts fasten_off and marker #1 you ll now work a series of short row as a go to short row continuation of the yoke these short row are worked on the back panel only in between markers #1 and #4 and their role is to raise the back neck in order to provide a better fit at the shoulders and prevent the fabric from gathering uncomfortably at the front of the neck row 1 ws chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as join slip_stitch in next st half_double_crochet in next st across until you reach marker #4 placing your last half_double_crochet in marked slip_stitch turn 67 73 79 87 93 101 107 113 121 127 st row 2 rs chain 1 slip_stitch in first st half_double_crochet in next st photo 21 yoke completed slip_stitch in next st across turn row 3 ws chain 1 half_double_crochet in first st slip_stitch in next st half_double_crochet in next st across turn to prepare the yoke for the short row and repeat row 2-3 2 more times then repeat row 2 once for subsequent split for sleeves you ll first delimitate the a total of 8 short row do not fasten_off front and back panels from the sleeve panels by with rs of your work facing you and the neckline marking them using 4 numbered stitch markers pointing downwards as shown in photo 22 move with rs of the garment facing you counting from marker #4 one st to the right
